articles.title: Nespresso Is Having Insane Prime Day Deals on Its Best Machines
articles.author: Nykia Spradley
articles.summary: Nespresso machines are currently on sale, offering an opportunity to upgrade to a higher-quality coffee experience alongside other lifestyle improvements like new clothes, tech, and home goods.

articles.title: 29 Things To Put In Your Bag To Make Those Long 'Welp, I'm Not Going To Be Home Until After Dinner' Days Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched the Hydrating Core Lip Shine and a sheer tint moisturizing "Squeeze Me" lip balm. Maybelline introduced Instant Age Rewind concealer for quick touch-ups. Naked Sundays released CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum, a hydrating SPF that works well with makeup. Additionally, a new mini Kindle has been launched, featuring a faster processor, brighter screen, smaller size, and extended battery life.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 vs. Flip7 FE: Which Foldable is Right for You?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced two new foldable smartphone models, the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 FE. The Galaxy Z Flip7 is positioned as the premium offering with top-tier specifications, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 FE aims to provide a more affordable option, democratizing the foldable experience.

articles.title: Samsung Unveil Latest Galaxy: Z Fold7 & Z Flip7 Go Naija!
articles.author: Hadiza Yusuf
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the launch of the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7, its latest foldable phones. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features a larger screen and improved multitasking capabilities, while the Z Flip7 boasts a compact design with an AI-powered FlexWindow. Both devices are available for pre-order in various colors, supported by Samsung Care+ for accidental damage and repairs.

articles.title: I tested three lipsticks with clever colour-changing tech – one hydrating option suits every wearer
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Clinique launched Nude Honey, the newest addition to their Almost Lipstick range, featuring a mix of cool and warm tones designed to suit every wearer. This launch follows the success of Black Honey and Pink Honey. Barry M Genie Lip Paint and Dior Addict Lip Glow are also mentioned for their color-changing properties and hydrating benefits, respectively.

articles.title: I tested three lipsticks with clever colour-changing tech – one hydrating option suits every wearer
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Barry M introduced Genie Lip Paint, a color-changing lipstick that transforms into a bright pink shade. Clinique launched Nude Honey, a new addition to its Almost Lipstick range, designed with a unique mix of tones to suit every wearer. Jo Malone released Raspberry Ripple Cologne, a limited-edition fizzy scent with raspberry and creamy musk notes.

articles.title: I tested three lipsticks with clever colour-changing tech – one hydrating option suits every wearer
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Barry M's Genie Lip Paint transforms into a bright pink shade on the lips. Clinique launched Nude Honey, the newest addition to their Almost Lipstick range, formulated to suit all skin tones. Dior offers the Addict Lip Glow in 22 shades, providing hydration and shine.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: The Ultimate Folding Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a new foldable smartphone featuring a 200MP main camera, a Snapdragon processor, and enhanced AI. The device boasts improvements in display technology and durability, aiming to provide a more seamless viewing experience. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 also includes enhanced multitasking capabilities and S Pen support.

articles.title: My First Day with Amazon's Alexa Plus: Initial Thoughts
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa Plus, a generative AI-powered voice assistant, enhancing the original Alexa with more knowledge and user-friendliness. The new Alexa Plus offers improved capabilities in understanding and responding to casual language, including the ability to adapt mid-sentence.  New features include a chatbot-style interface, easier smart home gadget controls, and improved conversational skills for routines.

articles.title: I like my smartphones bright - here's what you need to know about phone brightness
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: In March 2025, Samsung demonstrated an OLED panel capable of reaching 5,000 nits of brightness. The iPhone 16 Pro peaks at 2,000 nits outdoors and is readable even in direct sunlight. Other device makers are targeting between 1,000 and 2,000 nits for HDR functions and 2,000 nits or higher for outdoor use.

articles.title: Nordstrom Anniversary Sale 2025: Top deals and offers on fashion wear, skincare, home essentials and more
articles.author: Ht Us Desk
articles.summary: The Nordstrom Anniversary Sale 2025 offers discounts on various products, including Nécessaire The Body Lotion at $45, Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray Duo for $50, Kiehl's Ultra Light Daily UV Defense SPF Serum for $45, Boll & Branch Two-Tone Waffle Blanket (Full/Queen) for $173, Large Wonder Oven for $183.99, We the Free Palmer Cuffed Baggy Jeans for $64.99, Coach Convertible Shoulder Bag for $229.99, Bombas Men's Cushioned No Show Socks (Pack of 3) for $26 and Béis Carry-On Suitcase for $199.99.

articles.title: These 40 Practical Products Must Have Been Crafted By A Genius
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing innovative products such as a hands-free electric can opener for smooth-edge can opening, a blackout stamp roller for securing personal information, and gardening gloves with claws for easier garden work. Other notable products include a waterproof eyeliner stamp, a fruit fly trap, pimple patches, a water bottle cup holder adapter, a pet hair remover, a reusable smart notebook, a hand-warming mug, and a tear-proof screen.

articles.title: 7 Ancient Windows Apps You Need to Stop Using (and What to Use Instead)
articles.author: Chifundo Kasiya
articles.summary: Microsoft is replacing older Windows applications with modern equivalents. New Media Player has improvements such as a modern interface and better integration with Windows 11. Microsoft's new Storage Sense automates the process of removing unwanted data, ensuring that users do not run out of space.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7: A 24-Hour Review Reveals Its Defining Feature
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip 5, available for pre-order starting at $1,099, with stylish colors and storage options of 256GB and 512GB. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 features a redesigned 'Flex Hinge' for minimized gap, improved dust resistance, enhanced durability, versatile folding angles, performance upgrades, refined imaging system and improved battery life.

articles.title: The evolution of Android: Decades of transformation
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Google's Android has evolved significantly since acquiring Android Inc. The first commercially available Android device was the HTC Dream (T-Mobile G1). Recently, foldable phones like the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold and Z Flip series and Google's Pixel Fold introduced new screen technology requiring Android adaptations.

articles.title: Sam's Club Just Dropped Their Version of This Texas Roadhouse Favorite
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Sam's Club has introduced Member's Mark Cinnamon Honey Butter, a product reminiscent of Texas Roadhouse's cinnamon honey butter. The 12.4-ounce tub is available for $6.48 and features a blend of butter, powdered sugar, honey, brown sugar syrup, and cinnamon, suitable for various baked goods and breakfast items.

articles.title: Amazon Ariane Grande perfume reduced to £29 is 'sweet and playful'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of Ariana Grande's 'Thank U Next' 50ml perfume to £28.95. The perfume features notes of wild raspberry, pink rose petals, crème de coconut, macaroon sugar, and velvet musk, and is described as sweet and playful. User reviews highlight its long-lasting scent and attractive bottle design.

articles.title: The Best Luxury Amazon Prime Day Deals of 2025

articles.summary: Dyson is entering the beauty market with hair tools that utilize its signature airflow technology. These tools aim to provide ease and efficiency.

articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa Plus, a generative AI-powered voice assistant with enhanced natural language understanding and smart home integration. The new Alexa Plus features a chatbot-style interface and aims to make interactions more natural and efficient. The user review highlights both the improvements and current limitations encountered during the initial experience with the new product.

articles.title: The sun's set on Prime Day but you can still get this 33% off SPF
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen is a non-greasy, water-resistant sunscreen with SPF 70 that provides UVA/UVB protection. The product features Dry-Touch technology, offering a matte finish suitable for makeup and is free of oxybenzone and PABA. Currently, it is available at a discounted price as part of an extended Prime Day deal on Amazon.

articles.title: Prime Day is over, but we found 101+ best extended deals for this weekend
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features deals from various companies like Dyson, Bissell, Dreame, Apple, Samsung, TCL, Hisense, ASUS, Lenovo, DeWalt, Ninja, Breville, Keurig, Vitamix, KitchenAid, Nespresso, Cozy Earth, SimpliSafe, Epson, Greenworks, Casper, Levoit, LifeStraw, Sunny Health & Fitness, Google, Crest, Medicube, Neutrogena, Shark, Warner, Michael Kors, Adidas, Calvin Klein, Ray-Ban, Levi's, Owlet, Frida Baby, Regalo, Bedsure, Melissa & Doug, Logitech, LEGO, Flexzilla, Owala, Gskyer, Igloo, Buzbug, Thermacell, Travelpro, and Samsonite, offering discounted prices on products like vacuums, electronics, kitchen appliances, home goods, clothing, baby products, pet supplies, toys, cell phones, outdoor items, and travel gear. The sale event provides consumers with opportunities to save on a wide range of products and includes launch date for TVs for next year.

articles.title: Should you install Apple's public beta software? Here's what to know.

articles.summary: Apple has released beta versions of its macOS, iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, and tvOS operating systems for developers and public testers. These beta releases allow users to experience and provide feedback on the upcoming versions of Apple's software before their official launch, with the public beta testing starting in July.

Other products featured include a tonsil stone remover, Squatty Potty for improved bowel movements, a stank-eliminating Dude bomb, and antibacterial butt acne-clearing lotion.

articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: OnePlus officially announced the OnePlus Nord 5 on July 08, 2025. This 5G-ready smartphone features a 5200 mAh battery with 80W wired charging and comes in colors like Phantom Grey, Dry Ice, and Marble Sands. The phone runs on Android 15 with OxygenOS 15 and has a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel wide lens.

articles.title: Empty Your Online Carts Of All Those Expensive Products You've Been Hesitant To Buy And Get These 38 More Affordable Versions Instead

Thirst Burst Drops, Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Physicians Formula Butter Glow & Go Stick. articles.title: Restyle your outfits on Instagram AI: Here's how
articles.summary: Instagram has introduced 'Restyle,' a new AI feature that allows users to change the color of clothing in photos and videos using text prompts. The Restyle feature is part of Meta's push toward AI editing tools, offering users creative flexibility for Reels, Stories, and Posts, and is being rolled out in phases to users.

articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The content describes the introduction of several products aimed at providing cooling solutions during hot weather. These include the cordless Shark Flex Breeze portable fan, designed for outdoor use with its powerful air flow and misting feature, and the Nuwave Brio 8-quart air fryer, which offers a cooler alternative to using a conventional oven during hot days.

articles.title: Google Confirms Most Pixel Users Must Not Install This Update
articles.author: Zak Doffman
articles.summary: Google announced a new Android Canary release channel, replacing the developer preview program. This program offers developers earlier builds of Android to test new platform capabilities. Google warns that this Canary channel is intended for developers and will likely contain bugs and breaking changes.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G86 Power Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Motorola Moto G86 Power on May 29, 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 6720 mAh battery with 30W wired charging, a 6.67-inch P-OLED display, and a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel wide lens. It is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 7300 processor and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: Samsung Days Sale begins on July 12 with exclusive AI-powered deals across categories
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung launched its 'Samsung Days Sale' from July 12 to 18, 2025, offering discounts on AI-powered smartphones, TVs, laptops, and home appliances. Customers can pre-book the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 512GB models at the price of their 256GB counterparts and avail offers on Samsung's premium TV lineup with up to 40% off and other benefits.

articles.title: 'Perfect summer' M&S dress that's a 'great shape for hourglass figure'
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has introduced the Linen Rich Square Neck Mini Shift Dress, priced at £29.50. The dress features a striped pattern, a lightweight linen and viscose mix, and is available in black and white stripes, pink, and indigo. The product has received positive feedback from customers, praising its shape, comfort, and versatility.

articles.title: After Having It For A Week, We Never Want To Be Without It: 28 Products Under $20 That Truly Make A Difference

Howard Feed-N-Wax Wood Polish and Conditioner uses beeswax and orange oil to polish and protect wood surfaces. Foot Glide helps prevent blisters, and CND SolarOil aids in nail care after removing press-on nails.

articles.author: ANI

The AI Clothes Changer allows users to explore various styles without physical try-ons, while the Item Eraser removes unwanted objects from photos. These tools aim to enhance self-expression and streamline photo curation.

articles.summary: Amazon features top-rated lip liners with creamy, matte perfection during the Prime Day Sale. These liners offer features such as smooth application, long-lasting shades in sets of 12, waterproof matte formulas, and high-pigment for all-day wear.

articles.title: Line It Like a Pro: 4 Lip Liner Sets to Slay Every Lip Look This Prime Day

articles.summary: The article highlights the use of AI tools in building brand identities, focusing on tools like ChatGPT and Turbologo for logo generation. Turbologo is introduced as a service which allows customization of logos, fonts and layouts to create a brand identity.

articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Ai+ is launching the Ai+ Pulse smartphone today in India, priced at INR 4,499 for the 4GB/64GB variant. The Ai+ Nova 5G will go on sale tomorrow. Both will be available on Flipkart, Flipkart Minutes, and Shopsy with special launch offers.

articles.title: Robot Vacuum's Clever Navigation and Prime Day Discount: A Must-Have Deal
articles.summary: Dreame launched the X50 robot vacuum with advanced AI and live monitoring capabilities. The new model allows users to monitor their homes remotely and offers a front-facing camera with a real-time view through a companion app. The X50 also features an advanced AI system designed to navigate complex home environments.

articles.title: Seagate launches compact SSD for on-the-go data needs
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Seagate has launched the Ultra Compact SSD in the Philippines, a small, portable storage solution with transfer speeds up to 1,000MB/s. Available in 1TB and 2TB capacities, the SSD features drop, dust, and water resistance, connecting via USB-C to various devices. To celebrate the launch, purchases made between June 27 and July 15 include a ₱500 eGift voucher.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day Sale is LIVE: Up to 60% off on the best washing machines from LG, Samsung, Haier and other brands
articles.summary: Several companies, including LG, Bosch, Haier, IFB, Godrej, Samsung, Voltas Beko, and Midea, are offering their washing machines during the Amazon Prime Day Sale. These machines feature technologies like AI Direct Drive, steam wash, Direct Motion Motor, and Hexa Bloom impeller, and they offer benefits such as allergen reduction, stain removal, and energy efficiency.

articles.title: Nokia Alien Max: A Portal Phone with Immersive Display

Additionally, the Nokia Alien Max is anticipated as a 'portal phone' featuring a rollable OLED screen, advanced processing with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 or MediaTek Dimensity, AR/VR capabilities, and a high-end camera system.
